TopicTitle: Unity crash report: detaching InternalRCS part in VAB

Articles.Content:
A "real" game crash with a crash report from the Unity crash handler.

What happened last: 

Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "RO.InternalRCSx1.28.45/model/InternalRCS/Parts/RCS1/RCS-MP-N-1(Clone)/MPnozzle/90/MP90-N1" 
(Filename:  Line: 229)

Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "RO.InternalRCSx1.28.45/model/InternalRCS/Parts/RCS1/RCS-MP-N-1(Clone)/MPnozzle/90/MP90-N1" 
(Filename:  Line: 229)

Crash!!!

All logs and crash dump to be found here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gb7nwbfpk3d39yf/2022111101.7z?dl=1
